info.description: This API allows you to discover employment opportunities from various providers, as well as income information.
info.name: Jobs API

item.description: Get a list of jobs, use the `/v2/bing/get` for more information on a specific job.
item.name: Search and list jobs

query.description:
**Optional**

Keywords, job-title, company-name, position or any other relevant search-query.

**Required if token is not set**

Location of the job offer, like country or city in any combination.

**Optional**

The maximum age of when a result was added to Bing, will return everything by default.

**Allowed values**

week, day or empty

**Optional**

Filter by job-types, like fulltime, contractor, etc. Multiple values are possible and need to be separated by semicolon (;). Will return everything if not set.

**Allowed values**

contractor, fulltime, parttime or temporary separated by a semicolon (;)

**Optional**

Boolean to get only remote-jobs, will default to `false` if not set.

**Allowed values**

true or false

**Optional**

Pagination token from previous response as the `meta.nextToken` to get the next batch of results.

response.body:

query.description:
**Optional**

Keywords, job-title, company-name, position or any other relevant search-query.

**Required if token is not set**

Location of the job offer, like country or city in any combination.

**Optional**

The maximum age of when a result was added to Bing, will return everything by default.

**Allowed values**

week, day or empty

**Optional**

Filter by job-types, like fulltime, contractor, etc. Multiple values are possible and need to be separated by semicolon (;). Will return everything if not set.

**Allowed values**

contractor, fulltime, parttime or temporary separated by a semicolon (;)

**Optional**

**Allowed values**

true or false

**Optional**

query.description:

item.description: Get a list of job from Indeed.
item.name: Search and list jobs

query.description:
**Optional**

Keywords, job-title, company-name, position or any other relevant search-query.

**Optional**

Location of the job offer, like city, towns or provinces.

**Required if token is not set**

Parameter to get the titles for the required county.

**Allowed format**

^[A-Za-z]{2}$

**Optional**

Sorting of the results, can either be by `relevance` or by `date`, will be set to `relevance` by default.

**Allowed values**

relevance or date

**Optional**

Distance of the job offers from the location.

**Allowed format**

^[0-9]+$

**Optional**

Type of the distance, can either be `km` or `miles`, will be set to `km` by default.

**Allowed values**

km or miles

**Optional**

Pagination token from previous response as the `meta.nextToken` to get the next batch of results.

response.name: Successful response

query.description:
**Optional**

Keywords, job-title, company-name, position or any other relevant search-query.

**Optional**

Location of the job offer, like city, towns or provinces.

**Required if token is not set**

Parameter to get the titles for the required county.

**Allowed format**

^[A-Za-z]{2}$

**Optional**

Sorting of the results, can either be by `relevance` or by `date`, will be set to `relevance` by default.

**Allowed values**

relevance or date

**Optional**

Distance of the job offers from the location.

**Allowed format**

^[0-9]+$

**Optional**

Type of the distance, can either be `km` or `miles`, will be set to `km` by default.

**Allowed values**

km or miles

**Optional**

Pagination token from previous response as the `meta.nextToken` to get the next batch of results.

item.description: Get a list of jobs, use the `/v2/linkedin/get` for full details on a specific job.
item.name: Search and list jobs

query.description:
**Optional**

Keywords, job-title, company-name, position or any other relevant search-query.

**Optional**

ID of organizations like companies and schools the job-postings should be from, use the `Search and list organization IDs` endpoint for valid IDs. Will return everything by default.

**Allowed format**

^\d+(;\d+)*;?$

**Optional**

Location of the job offer, like country or city. Will be `Worldwide` if empty.

**Optional**

The maximum age of when a result was added to LinkedIn, will return everything by default.

**Allowed values**

month, week or day

**Optional**

Filter by job-types, like fulltime, contractor, etc. Multiple values are possible and need to be separated by semicolon (;). Will return everything by default.

**Allowed values**

contractor, fulltime, parttime, intern or temporary separated by a semicolon (;)

**Optional**

Filter by experience-levels, like intern, director, etc. Multiple values are possible and need to be separated by semicolon (;). Will return everything by default.

**Allowed values**

intern, entry, associate, midSenior or director separated by a semicolon (;)

**Optional**

Filter by workplace-types, like remote, hybrid, etc. Multiple values are possible and need to be separated by semicolon (;). Will return everything by default.

**Allowed values**

remote, hybrid or onSite separated by a semicolon (;)

**Optional**

Pagination token from previous response as the `meta.nextToken` to get the next batch of results.

response.body:

  "_links": {

response.name: Successful response

query.description:
**Optional**

Keywords, job-title, company-name, position or any other relevant search-query.

**Optional**

ID of organizations like companies and schools the job-postings should be from, use the `Search and list organization IDs` endpoint for valid IDs. Will return everything by default.

**Allowed format**

^\d+(;\d+)*;?$

**Optional**

Location of the job offer, like country or city. Will be `Worldwide` if empty.

**Optional**

The maximum age of when a result was added to LinkedIn, will return everything by default.

**Allowed values**

month, week or day

**Optional**

Filter by job-types, like fulltime, contractor, etc. Multiple values are possible and need to be separated by semicolon (;). Will return everything by default.

**Allowed values**

contractor, fulltime, parttime, intern or temporary separated by a semicolon (;)

**Optional**

Filter by experience-levels, like intern, director, etc. Multiple values are possible and need to be separated by semicolon (;). Will return everything by default.

**Allowed values**

intern, entry, associate, midSenior or director separated by a semicolon (;)

**Optional**

Filter by workplace-types, like remote, hybrid, etc. Multiple values are possible and need to be separated by semicolon (;). Will return everything by default.

**Allowed values**

remote, hybrid or onSite separated by a semicolon (;)

**Optional**

Pagination token from previous response as the `meta.nextToken` to get the next batch of results.

item.description: Get job details by its ID, use the `/v2/linkedin/search` endpoint to search for jobs.
item.name: Get job details

query.description:
**Required**

ID of the job, to get allowed values, use the `search` endpoint.

**Allowed format**

^\d+$

item.description: Get a list of jobs, use the `/v2/xing/get` for more information on a specific job.
item.name: Search and list jobs

query.description:
**Required if token is not set**

Keywords, job-title, company-name, position or any other relevant search-query.

**Optional**

Location of the job offer, like country or city in any combination - locations should be written in german, as Xing is a german speaking job-market.

**Optional**

The maximum age of when a result was added to Xing, will return everything by default.

**Allowed values**

week, day, month or empty

**Optional**

Filter by job-types, like fulltime, contractor, etc. Multiple values are possible and need to be separated by semicolon (;). Will return everything by default.

**Allowed values**

contractor, fulltime, intern, parttime, seasonal, temporary or voluntary separated by a semicolon (;)

**Optional**

Filter by career-levels, like intern, manager, etc. Multiple values are possible and need to be separated by semicolon (;). Will return everything by default.

**Allowed values**

student, entry, professional, manager, executive or seniorExecutive separated by a semicolon (;)

**Optional**

Workplace type, like remote, hybrid or on-site. Multiple values are possible and need to be separated by semicolon (;). Will return everything by default.

**Allowed values**

remote, hybrid or onSite separated by a semicolon (;)

**Optional**

Minimum yearly salary for the posted jobs. Will return everything by default.

**Allowed format**

^[0-9]+$

**Optional**

Pagination token from previous response as the `meta.nextToken` to get the next batch of results.

response.name: Successful response

**Optional**

**Allowed values**

**Optional**

contractor, fulltime, intern, parttime, seasonal, temporary or voluntary separated by a semicolon (;)

**Optional**

Filter by career-levels, like intern, manager, etc. Multiple values are possible and need to be separated by semicolon (;). Will return everything by default.

**Allowed values**

student, entry, professional, manager, executive or seniorExecutive separated by a semicolon (;)

**Optional**

Workplace type, like remote, hybrid or on-site. Multiple values are possible and need to be separated by semicolon (;). Will return everything by default.

**Allowed values**

remote, hybrid or onSite separated by a semicolon (;)

**Optional**

Minimum yearly salary for the posted jobs. Will return everything by default.

**Allowed format**

^[0-9]+$

**Optional**

Pagination token from previous response as the `meta.nextToken` to get the next batch of results.
